title: Last symbol of a word - extension

blocks.name: lswn0
blocks.content: The last symbol of a not empty word exists. The empty set must be excluded as symbol, because otherwise, it cannot be distinguished between valid cases ( ` (/) ` is the last symbol) and invalid cases ( ` (/) ` means that no last symbol exists. This is because of the special definition of a function in set.mm. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm lswn0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wnel(emptycls, c1), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)), wne(cfv(clsw, c0), emptycls))
} = {
  eqnetrd(cfv(clsw, c0), emptycls, cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wnel(emptycls, c1), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wnel(emptycls, c1), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wceq(cfv(clsw, c0), cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1))))

  com23(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wnel(emptycls, c1), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wne(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), emptycls))
  syl6(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wi(wnel(emptycls, c1), wne(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), emptycls)), wcel(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), c1))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wi(wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wcel(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), c1)), wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  wrdf(c0, c1)
  lencl(c0, c1)
  ex(wa(wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0)), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wcel(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), c1))
  ffvelrnd(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), c1, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), wa(wa(wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0)), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)))
  simpll(wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0))
  adantll(wf(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0)), c1), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wcel(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))))
  syl3anbrc(wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)), wcel(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, c0))), wcel(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wbr(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), clt, cfv(chash, c0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)), wcel(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
  nnm1nn0(cfv(chash, c0))
  biimpri(wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn))
  elnnne0(cfv(chash, c0))
  adantr(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0), wne(cfv(chash, c0), nat0), wbr(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), clt, cfv(chash, c0)))
  ltm1d(cfv(chash, c0), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn0))
  nn0re(cfv(chash, c0))
  elfzo0(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cfv(chash, c0))
  necon2ad(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), emptycls, wcel(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), c1), wnel(emptycls, c1))
  syl6ibr(wcel(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), emptycls), wn(wnel(emptycls, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c1))
  com12(wcel(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, c1))
  eqcoms(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), emptycls, wi(wcel(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), c1), wcel(emptycls, c1)))
  com12(wceq(emptycls, cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1))), wcel(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), c1), wcel(emptycls, c1))
  eleq1a(cfv(c0, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)), c1, emptycls)
  nnel(emptycls, c1)
}
